sense.gloss: (Platonic) ideal (of how things ought to be, e.g. human rights), foundational principle, idea, conception (e.g. of the university), doctrine, ideology

sdata.e: These ideas are embodied in the constitution.

sdata.j: ↑戦後↑↓せんご↓↑日本↑↓にっぽん↓では↑民主↑↓みんしゅ↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓の|↑理念|↑↓りねん↓が↑普及↑↓ふきゅう↓した。
sdata.e: After the war, the idea of democracy spread throughout Japan.

sdata.e: The precious results of democracy are the apple of the people's eye and the people will fight to maintain these ideals.

sdata.e: Sustainable development is the concept of the current generation utilizing the environment and meet human demands while not harming the ability of future generations to satisfy their own demands and interests.
